details.description: Contact the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) - email, phone, letter, driving test, practical driving test
details.body:
There are different contact details for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) depending on your enquiry.

Check the driving section first to see if your question is answered there.

Theory tests

You can use the following ways to contact DSA about theory tests.

DSA theory test bookings and enquiries

customercare@pearson.com
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (English bookings), 0300 200 1188 (English enquiries) 0300 200 1133 (Welsh bookings)
Textphone: 0300 200 1166
Fax: 0300 200 1177
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm


DSA
PO BOX 381
M50 3UW

Practical tests

You can use the following ways to contact DSA about practical tests.

DSA practical test bookings and enquiries

customer.services@dsa.gsi.gov.uk
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)
Textphone: 0300 200 1144
Fax: 0300 200 1155
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm


DSA
PO Box 280
Newcastle-Upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP

General enquiries

You can use the following information to contact DSA with a general enquiry.

DSA customer service centre

customer.services@dsa.gsi.gov.uk
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)
Textphone: 0300 200 1144
Fax: 0300 200 1155
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm


DSA
PO Box 280
Newcastle-Upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP

tags.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Book your practical driving test from £62 using the only official driving test booking service - book online or by phone or post
Book your theory test from £31 using this official theory test booking service - you'll need your provisional licence number and an email address to book online

related.title: Change the date of your practical driving test

details.description: Change your practical driving test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
The cost of the driving theory and practical tests for different types of vehicles
